message:
Hello,

I wanted to send you a quick email about BridalLive, the software I use to manage my store. It's powerful, simple to use and makes running my store so much easier.

You will get a $125 credit - a free month of their Standard Plan - when you sign up for one of their paid plans. Plus, once you are a member you can earn unlimited free months with their referral program.

I'd like to invite you to give it a try. Sign up using the link below to claim your $125 credit and I'll get mine too!

http://www.bridallive.com/referral.html?ref=ee0c75dc&refName=Elena

Have a great day!
Elena
